I am at a loss for words. I do not like gender bender, I do not like gangbang, I do not like ugly bastard, however, all that shit went flying out the window and i edged myself all the way to the end like a mad man for this one. Weirdly exciting? Idk what to say.

wew.... looks like I came too late...... the art is ok, it's shindol after all. Glad to see some happy ending in one of his multi-work series, but the story kills me more than my boner. I'd expected "something" in emergence to show up again, but I guess I disappointed myself (I finish it be4 this one). But who am I to ask for some more realistic contents in a doujin. I second that, Kazuma_san.

This is actually an old story but  can't remember the name. The ending was less satisfying than I remember it.

Usually with stories about moral decay I prefer to see the character(s) suffer, and suffer severely. Instead the writer throws in convenient plot device character to waive what should have happened and usher futanari into the mix. Can you imagine how the kid will turn out? Reprehensible.

It's just more satisfying to see bad behaviour being punished, and the opposite when it is rewarded.
Art is great but the stories is just plain uncomfortable to read
